description:
Jim Ryan practices in state and federal court in the following areas:

  • Appeals (Civil)

  • Employment Advising and Litigation for employers and employees

    + Noncompetition agreements
    + E    mployment agreements
    + Separation and severance agreements
    + Wrongful discharge and discrimination claims of all kinds

  • Business and Commerical Advising and Litigation

  • Representation of Medical Personnel

    + Employment agreements
    + Separation and severance agreements
    + Disciplinary and licensing issues

  • Administrative Hearings before Licensing and Disciplinary Boards for Physicians, Psychologists, Dentists, and other professionals

  • Local Counsel for Out-of-State Law Firms

  • Mediation, Arbitration, and Special Master (serves as a mediator, arbitrator, and Special Master in civil cases)

    For a more complete description of areas of practice, see the "Home Page" of the firm's website at http://www.ryanlawfirm.com.
